subject: chore: remove api/ directory — separate Vercel project
body:
The api/ directory is a standalone project deployed independently to
Vercel. It does not belong in this frontend repository. Removed:

- api/ directory (vercel.json, package.json, tsconfig, serverless functions)
- docs/interest-api-setup.md (deployment docs for the API project)
- Updated CLAUDE.md to note the API is a separate project

Tags: cleanup, project-structure
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 3
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: interest-form
Semver: patch
